## Packages

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(patchwork)
library(ggridges)
library(survivoR)

```


## Data

If necessary install the package `tidyTuesdayR` to get the data using `install.packages("tidytuesdayR")`:

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2021, week = 23) # get dataset
tuesdata <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-06-01/summary.csv')
```

### Data structure and cleaning

```{r}
# data structure
glimpse(tuesdata)

# to factor
tuesdata$country <- factor(tuesdata$country)

```

```{r}
# plot 1 - heatmap with countries with more programs
tuesdata %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarize(count = n())

# number of times each winner participates
tuesdata %>% 
  group_by(factor(full_name)) %>% 
  summarize(count = n())

# get each season length

tuesdata <- tuesdata %>% 
  mutate(season_length = ended - premiered,
         filming_length = filming_ended - filming_started)


```
